name: Youtube - Modern Dark [3.0]
description:
v3.0:
Jan 28 2013: completely redone for the new google+ youtube layout. Still a work in progress with lots of bugs.

v2.0:
May 23 2011: [...]

Jun 30 2011: Small fixes and tweaks

Sep 13 2011: Pay no attention to this. I fixed a minor bug due to a recent layout change from youtube by changing one value in the script.

Oct 1 2011: fixed x-button placement for list-view videos. Sorry I didn't update this earlier.

Preview: http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2011/146/3/f/youtube___dark_preview_by_0m1nus-d3hbk32.png




This is the most organized script I've written. Hopefully that makes it easier to maintain.

Here's a the mock-up I used as inspiration:

http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2011/023/c/5/youtube___dark_mock_up_by_0m1nus-d37uay5.png

Everything is free to use, no credit necessary, but feel free to let me know if you do use anything.

NOTICE: This style will only work on Firefox 3.6 and later and is only tested on the latest stable release of firefox.
